preferencesBlock.preference2Desc: Work with personal data is clearly regulated
preferencesBlock.preference3Desc: Status of the internal payment system
preferencesBlock.preference4Desc: Maximum support for electronic document management

partnersBlock.blockContent: We are always open for cooperation with new partners and for providing quality service to a wide range of customers. Therefore, our affiliate program gives the opportunity to earn on recommendations and connected clients for everyone associated with online business.

developersBlock.blockContent: We provide a universal payment API and ready-made modules for CMS-systems, which will allow you to connect payment on the site quickly and easily.

industrySolutions.metaDescription: Modern fintech solutions for rapid business development!
industrySolutions.block1Desc1: Instant divide of payment by different recipients when paying for an order from several suppliers. You will receive a detailed report on the payments based on the results of the calculations.
industrySolutions.block1Desc2: The ability to focus on expanding the range and quality of customer service, saving time on payments to suppliers.
industrySolutions.block1Desc3: The fastest time for receiving money for goods sold on the marketplaces, what minimizes the cash gap.
industrySolutions.block2Desc1: Add extra value to your online store by accepting credit cards online, making instant returns if the product is not in stock or doesn’t fit, and providing a guarantee of product delivery.
industrySolutions.block2Desc2: Our product "Plug-n-Pay" will allow you to start accepting payments in 1 day. No paperwork, no loss of time and money!
industrySolutions.block2Desc3: The guarantee of the safety of money and the protection of personal data is provided by the security standards PCI DSS 3.1, GDPR requirements and the financial license of the NBU.
industrySolutions.block3Desc1: Our range of payment services will allow you to reduce operating costs of calculations with partners and receiving payments from travelers.
industrySolutions.block3Desc2: Now you can send invoices via email, Viber, WhatsApp or any other messenger immediately after talking with a tourist.
industrySolutions.block3Desc3: The ability to pay for a ticket right from your mobile phone, saving time on finding a terminal or typing a card number for money transfer. An additional degree of protection for the payment page will increase tourist loyalty.
industrySolutions.block4Desc1: Automate payments for your taxi fleet, accepting payments from passengers and instantly paying your drivers by transferring to a bank card.
industrySolutions.block4Desc2: Thanks to our card storage technology, a passenger can once add a card in his e-cabinet and then pay for trips without unnecessary actions.
industrySolutions.block4Desc3: The ability to receive rewards for the trip at any convenient time and to any bank card registered in the driver’s cabinet.
industrySolutions.block5Desc1: You will be able to give out loans to bank cards and accept refunds remotely, significantly reducing the costs of servicing physical points and speeding up the customer service process.
industrySolutions.block5Desc2: The availability of a personal account simplifies the process of payments monitoring, as well as giving out a loan to both one borrower and many at once.
industrySolutions.block5Desc3: Instant money transfer to a bank card allows you to use the funds for your needs immediately and to repay a microloan without delays and additional fees.

bulkPayments.metaDescription: Mass payments to multiple accounts or cards in a few clicks!
bulkPayments.pageIntro: Created for those who need to pay fees or give out loans on bank cards of any number of recipients. All payments go online.
bulkPayments.block1Desc1: Upload a pre-made file in your account or make payments using our API
bulkPayments.block1Desc2: See online payment history, payee data, account status, and statuses for each transaction
bulkPayments.block1Desc3: We offer unique rates that will be comfortable for your business model

aboutUs.metaDescription: UAPAY enables businesses to be more flexible, save time and costs. Find out how.
aboutUs.introLine1: UAPAY is a national payment service that provides financial and technical solutions for any type of online business. Our team of professionals will help you automate payments and speed up business processes.
aboutUs.introLine2: The company, founded in 2013, offers competitive rates and guarantees reliability. We care about the security and speed of online payment, so we try to use the latest technologies that provide the required level of payments.
aboutUs.introLine3: A high level of service, transparency and reliability of transactions, prompt and qualified work of a support service - all this allowed us to gain the trust of our customers and secure the image of an honest and stable company.

cookiesPolicy.metaDescription: Here is a description of the UAPAY cookie policy.

modusOperandi.metaDescription: Please see the requirements and policy of collaboration between UAPAY and websites.
modusOperandi.p1: The site must have an SSL security certificate.
modusOperandi.p2: There must be symbols of the IPS VISA and MasterCard.
modusOperandi.p3: It should be clear what payment is accepted for, what is sold on the merchant's website.
modusOperandi.p4: The site must be functioning, filled with content and working internal links.
modusOperandi.p5: The must be publicly available and not ask for a login/password to enter.
modusOperandi.p6: If there is a personal account, test access must be provide. The personal accounts should be hosted on the same domain as the main site.
modusOperandi.p7: Goods/Services should not contradict the current legislation of Ukraine.
modusOperandi.li3: phone and email address of the organization selling the goods or services;
modusOperandi.li6: terms and conditions of return and exchange;
modusOperandi.p9: Goods / services should be described in details: the description should include the characteristics of the goods and services offered, their consumer properties and price.
modusOperandi.p10: Prices must be indicated in the national currency of Ukraine - hryvnia.
modusOperandi.p11: All pages that are related to the sale of goods or services on the website of the online store must be under a single domain name.
modusOperandi.p12: There must be Information about the payment procedure and delivery.
modusOperandi.p13: If any requirements will not be complied within 30 days from the date of signing the service contract, the payment provider may unilaterally disable payment acceptance.
